pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
*******************************GENERIC HOBBS METER******************************* Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://github.com/simstrumentation
Hobbs meter for MSFS. Includes 2 styles - round and rectangular
Version info: - **v1.0** (9/21/2022)
NOTES: - Select Instrument Style user property to select the color of your text labels based on your panel background color
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
